short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open a chat with any unknown number quickly without the need to save it in contacts!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Most of the time you just need to send a message to someone you will never meet again, and you don't want to suffer from the headache of saving the number in the contact and remove it after sending.

Also sometimes you want to send him a message for two days only and don't want to write the number again in the app, so we have the history feature
